Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a thick-walled pottery wine-jar, pale-red fabric, interior and exterior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text on either side.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393104) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393104)
